document.full_text: james bond creator ian fleming's other famous invention, the magical car chitty chitty bang bang, is set to fly again with the publication of a new series of adventures by children's author frank cottrell boyce.
document.title: chitty chitty bang bang to fly again in new books
lines_and_colors: james bond creator ian fleming's other famous invention, the magical car chitty chitty bang bang, is set to fly again with the publication of a new series of adventures by children's author frank cottrell boyce.
